message:
{% set manager_name = frappe.db.get_value("Employee", {"user_id": frappe.session.user}, "name") %}

Dear {{ doc.employee }},

Your weekoff change request has been Approved by {{manager_name or frappe.session.user}}.
Please find the details below:

Request Summary:

  • Employee: {{ doc.employee }}
  • Workflow State: Approved
  • View Request: {% set week_off_link = frappe.utils.get_url() ~ '/app/weekoff-change-request/' ~ doc.name %} Click here
name: WeekOff Change Request Approved
subject: WeekOff Change Request: Approved - {{doc.employee}}
